data.text: Anyo be nànye ame dahe si ƒe zɔzɔme ŋu fɔɖiɖi mele o,
Menyo be dzo nanɔ mewò ɖe nuwo wɔwɔ ŋu gɔmesesemanɔmee
Ame ŋutɔ ƒe bometsitsie gblẽa eƒe agbe dome,
Kesinɔnunɔamesi dzea xɔlɔ̃ geɖe na ame,
Womagbe tohehe na aʋatsoɖasefo o
Ame geɖewo wɔa nu be woadze fia ŋu,
Ame dahe ƒe ƒometɔwo katã ɖea kɔ ɖa le eŋu,
Ame si, si nunya su la lɔ̃a eya ŋutɔ ƒe luʋɔ
Womagbe tohehe na aʋatsoɖasefo o
Agbe vivi nɔnɔ medze bometsila ʋuu keke
Ame ƒe nunya nana wògbɔa dzi ɖi
Fia ƒe dziku le abe dzata ƒe gbetete ene,
Viŋutsu tsibome nye fofoa ƒe gbegblẽ
Aƒewo kple kesinɔnuwo nye domenyinu tso dzilawo gbɔ,
Kuvia nana ame dɔa alɔ̃ yia eme ʋĩi
Ame si wɔna ɖe sedede dzi la dzɔa eƒe agbe ŋu,
Ame si nyo dɔ me na hiãtɔ la,
He to na viwò ŋutsuvi elabena eya mee mɔkpɔkpɔ le;
Ame si dzi kuna helĩhelĩ la,
Ɖo to aɖaŋuɖoɖo,
Nu geɖewo ame ɖo ɖe eƒe dzi me,
Nu si ame dina lae nye lɔlɔ̃ si meʋãna o;
Yehowavɔvɔ̃ kplɔa ame yia agbe gbɔe.
Ne kuviatɔ de asi nuɖugba me la,
Ƒo fewuɖula kple ati,
Ame si daa adzo fofoa,
Vinye, ne èdzudzɔ amehenyawo sese la,
Aʋatsoɖasefo ɖua fewu le afia nyui tsotso ŋu
Woɖo tohehe ɖi na fewuɖulawo
